tag_list: copywriter, media, internet, web, design, advertising
overview:
Zarrar Sheikh is a professional in the Internet development field whose beginnings were based on the practice as a copywriter. His understanding of theory, and execution of communications can be found across dozens of internet publications.

With his primary focus on delivering client communications to targeted, and every narrow markets both consumer and industrial, his augmentation of the advertising model is unique with respect to the number of sites he owns in New York City.

Zarrar Sheikh works with various technologies that create a dynamic, user friendly and engaging experience while delivering communications, and ensuring that the internet is more than just a pretty face, but also a work horse application.
